tests.name: Part 1 – Home & lists
tests.run: bash -lc 'npx jest __tests__/part1 --ci --runInBand > .grader_jest_out 2> .grader_jest_err; code=$?; cat .grader_jest_out .grader_jest_err | sed -r "s/\x1B\[[0-9;]*[mK]//g"; if [ $code -eq 0 ]; then echo "__ALL_TESTS_PASSED__"; fi; exit 0'

tests.name: Part 2 – Contact, Link, client route, next/image
tests.run: bash -lc 'npx jest __tests__/part2 --ci --runInBand > .grader_jest_out 2> .grader_jest_err; code=$?; cat .grader_jest_out .grader_jest_err | sed -r "s/\x1B\[[0-9;]*[mK]//g"; if [ $code -eq 0 ]; then echo "__ALL_TESTS_PASSED__"; fi; exit 0'
